concept.title: Site Overview Report
concept.shortdesc: The Site Metrics > Site Overview report displays at login and lets you immediately view and interact with relevant data. You can edit the layout, save it as a dashboard, and drill into the data for deeper analysis.

conbody.p: Click Layout in the toolbar to customize this report and save it as a dashboard.
If you designate a dashboard to display as the landing page, this report does not display automatically.
